sentences.en: A dictation was issued to all of the troops.
He had had an arm amputated and relied on her to take down his books from dictation.
sentences.cn: 他的一只胳膊截掉了，只能口授书的内容让她来记录。

sentences.en: I am able to get dictation and trancribe them rapidly into Chinese.
sentences.cn: 我会外文的口授笔记,同时能立即将其改写成汉文.

sentences.en: I wrote the letter at his dictation.
It was by Mr. Moy's dictation.
On dictation equipment, a device for removing a recording from the recording medium.
sentences.cn: 在口述记录设备上, 用来除去记录媒体上记录的一种装置.

sentences.en: On dictation equipment, a spool on which magnetic tape is wound.
sentences.cn: 在口述记录设备上, 一种卷绕磁带的轴.

sentences.en: Only recently, for example, has continuous speech recognition for dictation become available.
sentences.cn: 例如, 口授的连续语音识别直到最近才变得实用.

sentences.en: Prepare for lesson 21 & 22's dictation, please bring a red pen.
sentences.cn: 明天听写 第21-22 课的重点词语, 请带红笔.

sentences.en: The new secretary takes dictation very well.
sentences.cn: 那位新秘书善于记录口授.

sentences.en: The passages for dictation will not be supplied on cassette.
sentences.cn: 听写用的短文不会以磁带形式提供.

sentences.en: The pupils wrote at their teacher's dictation.
The teacher gave the pupils dictation.
The teacher will give us an English dictation today.
sentences.cn: 今天老师要给我们做英语听写.

sentences.en: There were no secretaries available to take dictation (= write down what someone is saying ) .
sentences.cn: 身边没有秘书记录口授内容。

sentences.en: There were no secretaries available to take dictation (= write down what someone is saying ).
sentences.cn: 身边没有秘书记录口授内容。

sentences.en: Write the date at the top of the page before dictation starts.
sentences.cn: 在口述开始之前,写日期在页顶部.

trans.tran_en: when you say words for someone to write down
